    <item>
  <title>Early Alert: Dialysis Tubing Set Issue from Vantive</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/early-alert-dialysis-tubing-set-issue-vantive</link>
  <description>Prismaflex Set deaeration chambers may dislodge from the Prismaflex Control Unit during use. </description>
  <pubDate>Wed, 14 Jan 2026 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/early-alert-dialysis-tubing-set-issue-vantive</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Modern Warrior Recalls “Modern Warrior Ready” Dietary Supplement Due to Undeclared 1,4-DMAA and Aniracetam, as Well as Tianeptine, Which has Not Been Approved for Supplement Use by the FDA.</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/safety/recalls-market-withdrawals-safety-alerts/modern-warrior-recalls-modern-warrior-ready-dietary-supplement-due-undeclared-14-dmaa-and-aniracetam</link>
  <description>[Phoenix, Arizona] – [12/22/25] – Modern Warrior is voluntarily recalling all lots of Modern Warrior Ready, a dietary supplement sold directly to consumers, after regulatory  testing identified the presence of undeclared ingredients, including tianeptine, 1,4-DMAA, and aniracetam..Tianeptine can c</description>
  <pubDate>Fri, 09 Jan 2026 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/safety/recalls-market-withdrawals-safety-alerts/modern-warrior-recalls-modern-warrior-ready-dietary-supplement-due-undeclared-14-dmaa-and-aniracetam</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Anthony Trinh, 123Herbals LLC (123HERBALS.COM) Issues Nationwide Recall of Silintan Capsules Due to the Presence of Undeclared Meloxicam</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/safety/recalls-market-withdrawals-safety-alerts/anthony-trinh-123herbals-llc-123herbalscom-issues-nationwide-recall-silintan-capsules-due-presence</link>
  <description>Rosemead, CA, ANTHONY TRINH, 123herbals LLC is voluntarily recalling all lots of Silintan capsules to the consumer level. FDA analysis has found the product to be tainted with meloxicam. Meloxicam, is an approved Nonsteroidal Anti-Inflammatory Drug, (NSAID) indicated for management of osteoarthritis</description>
  <pubDate>Fri, 09 Jan 2026 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/safety/recalls-market-withdrawals-safety-alerts/anthony-trinh-123herbals-llc-123herbalscom-issues-nationwide-recall-silintan-capsules-due-presence</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Organ Recovery Pack Correction: AVID Medical Issues Correction for Medical Convenience and Organ Recovery Kits</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/organ-recovery-pack-correction-avid-medical-issues-correction-medical-convenience-and-organ-recovery</link>
  <description>AVID is removing bags from Organ Recovery and Medical Convenience Kits due to the bags being made of non-medical grade Poly and lacking intact seals.</description>
  <pubDate>Fri, 09 Jan 2026 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/organ-recovery-pack-correction-avid-medical-issues-correction-medical-convenience-and-organ-recovery</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Intravascular PICC Catheter Recall: Bard Removes PowerPICC Intravascular Catheters</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/intravascular-picc-catheter-recall-bard-removes-powerpicc-intravascular-catheters</link>
  <description>This communication is part of the Communications Pilot to Enhance the Medical Device Recall Program</description>
  <pubDate>Mon, 05 Jan 2026 12:52:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/intravascular-picc-catheter-recall-bard-removes-powerpicc-intravascular-catheters</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Infusion Pump Software Recall: Baxter Removes Sigma Spectrum Infusion System Platforms</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/infusion-pump-software-recall-baxter-removes-sigma-spectrum-infusion-system-platforms</link>
  <description>This communication is part of the Communications Pilot to Enhance the Medical Device Recall Program</description>

    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/infusion-pump-software-recall-baxter-removes-sigma-spectrum-infusion-system-platforms</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Diagnostic Intravascular Catheter Recall: Conavi Removes Novasight Hybrid Catheters</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/diagnostic-intravascular-catheter-recall-conavi-removes-novasight-hybrid-catheters</link>
  <description>This communication is part of the Communications Pilot to Enhance the Medical Device Recall Program</description>
  <pubDate>Mon, 05 Jan 2026 10:25:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/diagnostic-intravascular-catheter-recall-conavi-removes-novasight-hybrid-catheters</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Esophageal pH Monitoring Capsule Recall: Medtronic and Given Imaging Remove Bravo CF Capsule Delivery Devices</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/esophageal-ph-monitoring-capsule-recall-medtronic-and-given-imaging-remove-bravo-cf-capsule-delivery</link>
  <description>This communication is part of the Communications Pilot to Enhance the Medical Device Recall Program</description>
  <pubDate>Mon, 05 Jan 2026 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/esophageal-ph-monitoring-capsule-recall-medtronic-and-given-imaging-remove-bravo-cf-capsule-delivery</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Infusion Pump Recall: Fresenius Kabi Removes Ivenix Large Volume Pumps</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/infusion-pump-recall-fresenius-kabi-removes-ivenix-large-volume-pumps</link>
  <description>Some Ivenix LVP Primary Administration Sets were assembled with the drip chamber and Luer Lock components in reversed positions, potentially leading to clinical complications</description>
  <pubDate>Mon, 05 Jan 2026 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/infusion-pump-recall-fresenius-kabi-removes-ivenix-large-volume-pumps</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Aspiration System Correction: Calyxo Updates Use Instructions for CVAC Aspiration Systems</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/aspiration-system-correction-calyxo-updates-use-instructions-cvac-aspiration-systems</link>
  <description>This communication is part of the Communications Pilot to Enhance the Medical Device Recall Program</description>
  <pubDate>Mon, 05 Jan 2026 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/aspiration-system-correction-calyxo-updates-use-instructions-cvac-aspiration-systems</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Custom Surgical Pack Recall: Alcon Removes Custom Pak Ophthalmic Procedure Packs</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/custom-surgical-pack-recall-alcon-removes-custom-pak-ophthalmic-procedure-packs</link>
  <description>Alcon recalls Custom Pak Ophthalmic Procedure Packs due to incomplete seals that may compromise sterility. Check lot numbers, recall instructions. </description>
  <pubDate>Fri, 02 Jan 2026 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/custom-surgical-pack-recall-alcon-removes-custom-pak-ophthalmic-procedure-packs</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Intravascular Administration Set Recall: ICU Medical Removes IV Gravity Burette Set</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/intravascular-administration-set-recall-icu-medical-removes-iv-gravity-burette-set</link>
  <description>ICU Medical removes IV Gravity Burette Set due to the burette component missing an internal shut-off valve intended to stop fluid flow.</description>
  <pubDate>Tue, 30 Dec 2025 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/intravascular-administration-set-recall-icu-medical-removes-iv-gravity-burette-set</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Blood Pump Controller Correction: Abiomed Updates Use Instructions for Automated Impella Controllers</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/blood-pump-controller-correction-abiomed-updates-use-instructions-automated-impella-controllers</link>
  <description>This communication is part of the Communications Pilot to Enhance the Medical Device Recall Program </description>
  <pubDate>Tue, 30 Dec 2025 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/blood-pump-controller-correction-abiomed-updates-use-instructions-automated-impella-controllers</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Anesthesia System Correction: GE HealthCare Updates Use Instructions for CareStation Anesthesia Systems</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/anesthesia-system-correction-ge-healthcare-updates-use-instructions-carestation-anesthesia-systems</link>
  <description>GE HealthCare issues updated use instructions for certain Carestation 600 and 700 series Anesthesia Systems</description>
  <pubDate>Tue, 30 Dec 2025 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/anesthesia-system-correction-ge-healthcare-updates-use-instructions-carestation-anesthesia-systems</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Continuous Glucose Monitoring Software Correction: Dexcom Issues Correction for Dexcom G6 and G6 Pro Software</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/continuous-glucose-monitoring-software-correction-dexcom-issues-correction-dexcom-g6-and-g6-pro</link>
  <description>A defect was discovered in the Dexcom G6 and G6 Pro Android US CGM App version 1.15.0 that may cause the app to shut down unexpectedly.</description>
  <pubDate>Mon, 29 Dec 2025 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/continuous-glucose-monitoring-software-correction-dexcom-issues-correction-dexcom-g6-and-g6-pro</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Gold Star Distribution Inc., Issues Recall of Certain FDA-Regulated Products in Three States Including Drugs, Devices, Cosmetics, Human Foods, and Pet Foods </title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/safety/recalls-market-withdrawals-safety-alerts/gold-star-distribution-inc-issues-recall-certain-fda-regulated-products-three-states-including-drugs</link>
  <description>Gold Star Distribution, Inc. (Gold Star or “the Company”) is recalling all FDA regulated products listed in this press release due to the presence of rodent and avian contamination.</description>
  <pubDate>Fri, 26 Dec 2025 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/safety/recalls-market-withdrawals-safety-alerts/gold-star-distribution-inc-issues-recall-certain-fda-regulated-products-three-states-including-drugs</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>System Correction: IMPRIS Imaging Inc Issues Correction for IMRIS Neuro III-SV </title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/system-correction-impris-imaging-inc-issues-correction-imris-neuro-iii-sv</link>
  <description>IMPRIS corrects IMRIS Neuro III-SV models due to the potential of ice blockage in the helium venting pipe</description>
  <pubDate>Tue, 23 Dec 2025 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/system-correction-impris-imaging-inc-issues-correction-imris-neuro-iii-sv</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title> Endovascular Graft Recall: Cook Medical Removes Zenith Alpha 2 Thoracic Endovascular Graft</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/endovascular-graft-recall-cook-medical-removes-zenith-alpha-2-thoracic-endovascular-graft</link>
  <description>Cook Medical is removing certain ZENITH ALPHA 2 THORACIC ENDOVASCULAR GRAFT proximal components because PTFE scrapings may enter the stent graft during deployment.  </description>
  <pubDate>Tue, 23 Dec 2025 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/endovascular-graft-recall-cook-medical-removes-zenith-alpha-2-thoracic-endovascular-graft</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Catheter Mount Recall: Draeger Removes ErgoStar Catheter Mounts </title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/catheter-mount-recall-draeger-removes-ergostar-catheter-mounts</link>
  <description>Drager is removing affected ErgoStar Cather Mounts due to cracks in the hose.<br>
 <br>
</description>
  <pubDate>Tue, 23 Dec 2025 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/catheter-mount-recall-draeger-removes-ergostar-catheter-mounts</guid>
    </item>
<item>
  <title>Early Alert: Convenience Kit Needle Issue from Integra LifeSciences</title>
  <link>http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/early-alert-convenience-kit-needle-issue-integra-lifesciences</link>
  <description>Integra LifeSciences is removing certain lots of Microsensor and Cerelink ICP Kits with potential corrosion stains on the included Tuohy Needle.</description>
  <pubDate>Tue, 23 Dec 2025 00:00:00 EST</pubDate>
    <dc:creator>FDA</dc:creator>
    <guid isPermaLink="true">http://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/medical-device-recalls-and-early-alerts/early-alert-convenience-kit-needle-issue-integra-lifesciences</guid>
    </item>

  </channel>
</rss>
